mapper.select:
select l.lesson_id, l.lesson_name, l.cover_url, l.end_time, l.create_time, u.user_id, u.name from st_lesson l join st_lesson_stu s on l.lesson_id = s.lesson_id join st_user u on l.user_id = u.user_id where s.user_id = #{userId} and s.status = 1
and l.lesson_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by s.create_time desc
